item.title: Self-Hosting DefectDojo Pro
item.description: DefectDojo Pro can be fully self-hosted in your own environment, giving you complete control over your infrastructure, data, and security posture. This deployment option is ideal for organizations with strict compliance, data residency, or internal security requirements, while still delivering all the advanced capabilities of DefectDojo Pro.
